about_the_game:
"The Mind's Decay" is a story-driven psychological horror game where Mark finds himself trapped in a cryptic, broken world.

As Mark prepares to celebrate his first marriage anniversary with his wife, he notices that things in the house have changed. Decay sets in, and the world begins to crumble. Step into a fragmented world where reality teeters on the edge. Overcome the darkness and cryptic challenges. Fight for survival within the enigma that engulfs you. Unveil the hidden truth and escape the depths of this shattered psyche.

This game is still in development, please add to your wishlist and join to our Discord server!
https://discord.gg/UePJtVRj8j

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
